AI Description: Berkeley UPC (Unified Parallel C) is an extension of the C programming language designed for multiprocessor parallel computing. It provides a set of language extensions for writing parallel programs that can run efficiently on a large-scale parallel machine.
Core Features: C Language Extension For Parallel Programming, High Performance On Large-Scale Parallel Machines, Support For Distributed & Shared Memory Systems, Allows For Explicit Communication & Synchronization Between Parallel Processes
General Tags: Parallel Computing, Multiprocessor, C Programming Language, High Performance Computing
